keyword: in and out burger calorie count
title: In-N-Out Burger Calorie Count
meta_description: Discover the in and out burger calorie count: 390 kcal for a standard hamburger, plus full macros, sodium, and tweaks for cheese or double patties.
assumptions: Standard hamburger: bun, 100% beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, special spread; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and custom orders. Check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard In-N-Out burger contains 390 kcal with 16 g protein and 19 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: What is the in and out burger calorie count for a standard hamburger?
How much protein in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: About 16 g protein per standard burger.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out burgers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 730 mg sodium per burger due to the spread and bun.

faqs.q: What changes the calorie count at In-N-Out?
faqs.a: Add-ons like cheese (+70 kcal), extra patties, or animal-style (grilled onions, extra spread) increase calories significantly.

faqs.q: How many carbs in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Approximately 39 g carbs, including 3 g fiber, mostly from the bun.
